title: How gun plot on Manchester's Jewish community was stopped
description: Two men planned an attack in Greater Manchester and a third man failed to report the plan.
content:

9 hours ago
Laura O'NeillNorth West

title: Van Gerwen shows his class but Peter Wright crashes out of PDC World Championship
description: Michael van Gerwen powered into the third round with a 3-1 over William O’Connor, but Peter Wright, the two-time winner, averaged just 79.20 as he was beaten 3-0 by Arno Merk at the PDC world championship
content:
Michael van Gerwen showed his class as he powered into the third round of the world championship. The three-time champion struggled in his opening match but brought his best to brush past William O’Connor 3-1.
It was an impressive performance by the ... [1547 chars]

title: Antoine Semenyo: Bournemouth forward to decide future as Chelsea show interest
description: Antoine Semenyo starts the process of deciding his future as Chelsea become the latest club to register an interest in the Bournemouth attacker.
content:
Antoine Semenyo has started the process of deciding his future as Chelsea became the latest club to register an interest in the Bournemouth forward.
Sources with knowledge of the situation have told BBC Sport that five clubs have enquired about the 2... [3169 chars]

title: Shropshire canal breach caused by collapse of artificial embankment
description: Work under way to refloat boats on emptied waterway after earthwork more than 200 years old fails
content:
The dramatic breach of a canal in the early hours of Monday, which sent two narrowboats tumbling into a hole and left others stranded, was caused by the collapse of an artificial embankment that had stood for more than 200 years.
As emergency service... [4169 chars]

title: PDC World Championship 2026: Peter Wright loses in straight sets to Arno Merk in round two
description: Two-time champion Peter Wright loses in straight sets to German debutant Arno Merk in round two of the PDC World Championship.
content:
German debutant Arno Merk said he was left "stunned" by his straight-set win over two-time champion Peter Wright at the PDC World Championship.
Wright, who triumphed at Alexandra Palace in 2020 and 2022, was well below par - winning just two legs in ... [595 chars]
